name: Blaster Faster
description:
<>

Control option button actually works now. With mobile controls, there will soon be a crosshair ahead of you so that you know where you are aiming. :)

<>

Added control options to menu and in game. PC controls- ship follows mouse, Mobile controls - ship moves with side of screen touched.

<>
Fixed resolution to better suit mobile in browser
